The number of campaigns with social media at their core has more than doubled over the last two years. #DCS2015
People ask @sentaonthego about mobile and social a lot. Gives example of a "pay-per-laugh" scheme at a theatre using iPads. #DCS2015

.@sentaonthego: "We try to inspire creative bravery in companies and agencies alike." #DCS2015
Next we'll be hearing from @sentaonthego, our final speaker of the event. #DCS2015
#DCS2015 Laja @DigiCatapult, @SadeLaja1, key take away from re-tweets of Budget comments more people signed up to them

Sade Laja, @DigiCatapult, @SadeLaja1 giving a keynote on forecasting the future of digital advertising #DCS2015
RT @A_d_a_m1: Enjoying learning from marketeers from organisations as diverse as the bfi, Heineken, worldpay and more at #DCS2015 @Currency…
.@katiprice: "I think it's about having that kind of killer content that would make somebody use their phone in the museum." #DCS2015
.@asuppel: "We are at the point where mobile-first becomes more realistic, but we have to think about the whole of the market." #DCS2015
.@javiernieto_: "No one likes to fill out forms, so if you fill out a form and no one gets back quickly you've lost that lead." #DCS2015
RT @lizzybethness: #DCS2015 folk: Here's the @V_and_A #savagebeauty web feature that I worked on that @katiprice just mentioned http://t.co…
Four per cent of people watching free BFI films go on to make a purchase. #DCS2015
.@javiernieto_ says the most important thing is to speak to your customers and find out what they like - it's "really valuable". #DCS2015
RT @alicermoore: 'Find the people and talk to them in the way that's appropriate to them'. Thanks @anthonythornton - all public orgs should…
.@javiernieto_: "A key thing is to keep engaging with customers in a way that is compelling." #DCS2015
.@athytn: "It may be that the website is the best place to see the film, but maybe it's not. Maybe it's YouTube or Facebook." #DCS2015
.@katiprice says it's not just about reaching the widest number of people. "Loyalty, for us, is really important." #DCS2015
What is ROI on engagement? "It tells us that we're doing something right... We use that to inform our strategy," says @lucytastic. #DCS2015
The BFI put films from its Flare festival online - it didn't make money, but was "very, very important" culturally, says @athytn. #DCS2015
.@athytn: "There is a great deal of pressure on increasing our income." There's a mandate to be a bit more commerically-focused. #DCS2015
.@katiprice says that if you were to ask management at the V&A, it'd be about web traffic and "access to our collections". #DCS2015
.@javiernieto_: "The main KPI we use is lead, basically... It's really that number that we work with." #DCS2015
Referrals are a key KPI for @asuppel at American Express. #DCS2015
American Express needs to do well in different search engines across the world - not just Google, says @asuppel. #DCS2015
.@asuppel: "We want to be sure that the customer is fully engaged with the product before they enter the application process." #DCS2015
